page.title: 06The School. Middleton.(1)
page.content: North Runcton school closed a few years ago when there were only about ten pupils left, but the{Primary} school at Middleton has 90 pupils and four teachers. Children start at the school when they are five years old. When they are 11 they transfer to Gaywood Park High School in Kings Lynn. There is a free school bus to take children to and from the high school. Middleton school takes children from Middleton parish (including Fair Green and Blackborough End) and a few children from North Runcton. The children walk or cycle to school or are brought in cars by parents. 35 children have{school meals}which are cooked at North Wootton and brought to the school in containers by taxi. The school has one dinner lady to serve meals and clear up.
